queue_type.description: The type of queue can be 'regular' and 'fifo'

delay_seconds.errorMessage: The 'delay_seconds' field must be a string

content_based_deduplication.errorMessage: The 'content_based_deduplication' field must be a boolean

max_message_size.errorMessage: The 'max_message_size' field must be a number between 0 and 262144

message_retention_period.errorMessage: The 'message_retention_period' field must be a number between 60 and 1209600

received_message_wait_time.errorMessage: The 'received_message_wait_time' field must be a nuber between 0 and 20

visibility_timeout.errorMessage: The 'visibility_timeout' field must be a number between 0 and 43200

max_receive_count.errorMessage: The 'max_receive_count' field must be a number in the 'dead_letter_queue' section

delay_seconds.errorMessage: The 'delay_seconds' field must be a number in the 'dead_letter_queue' section

max_message_size.errorMessage: The 'max_message_size' field must be a number in the 'dead_letter_queue' section

message_retention_period.errorMessage: The 'message_retention_period' field must be a number in the 'dead_letter_queue' section

receive_message_wait_time_seconds.errorMessage: The 'receive_message_wait_time_seconds' field must be a number in the 'dead_letter_queue' section

visibility_timeout.errorMessage: The 'visibility_timeout' must be a number in the 'dead_letter_queue' section

service_name.errorMessage: The 'service_name' parameter is required in each config in the 'event_consumers' section

batch_size.errorMessage: The 'batch_size' parameter must be a number between 1 and 10

errorMessage.additionalProperties: Invalid/Unknown property specified in the 'event_consumers' section

tags.description: An arbitrary list of key/value pairs to be added as tags to the service
tags.errorMessage: The 'tags' element must contain 1 or more simple key/value pairs where the values are strings or numbers
